title.rendered: 2024 Sands Shopping Carnival Draws Record-Breaking 120,000 Visits

content.rendered:
July 18-21 event supported Macao’s “tourism+” initiative 
Free business platform for local SMEs and Sands retailers   

MACAO, July 24, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The 2024 Sands Shopping Carnival successfully drew to a close Sunday at The Venetian® Macao’s Cotai Expo, after setting an all-time high of 120,000 visits during four days of shopping, activities and performances.


Continue Reading

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/2024-sands-shopping-carnival-draws-record-breaking-120-000-visits-302205339.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
